## bsGT variable

[binarySearch](./arrays.binarysearch.md) result index classifier for successor queries. Returns index of first item greater than search value or -1 if no such values exist.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bsGT: (i: number, n: number) => number
```

## Example


```ts
src = [10, 20, 30, 40];

bsGT(binarySearch(src, 25), src.length)
// 2

bsGT(binarySearch(src, 40), src.length)
// -1

```
